name: Design-A-Baby
description:
A game where you design babies.

Controls: Press space to design the baby.

Made for a game jam at my school, where we had to make small WarioWare-like games that had something to do with design.

I would include screenshots but honestly you should just play it, it's great! Who doesn't want to design babies? What are you waiting for? Why are you still reading this?

I did all the code, another person made all the art, and the sounds are from an online sound library of which I can no longer remember the name.
